name: Present Simple
examples: I work every day.
She plays the piano.

name: Present Continuous
examples: I am studying now.
They are watching TV.

name: Present Perfect
examples: I have finished my homework.
She has visited London.

name: Present Perfect Continuous
examples: I have been working all day.
She has been studying English for 3 years.

name: Past Simple
examples: I visited Paris last year.
She cooked dinner yesterday.

name: Past Continuous
examples: I was reading when you called.
They were playing football at 5 p.m.

name: Past Perfect
examples: I had finished the project before the deadline.
She had already left when I arrived.

name: Past Perfect Continuous
examples: I had been studying for hours before the exam.
They had been working all day when the storm came.

name: Future Simple
examples: I will call you tomorrow.
She will help us.

name: Future Continuous
examples: I will be working at 8 p.m.
They will be traveling next week.

name: Future Perfect
examples: I will have finished the book by tomorrow.
She will have graduated by next year.

name: Future Perfect Continuous
examples: I will have been working here for 5 years in June.
They will have been studying all night by the time you arrive.
